name: jsdom-webdriver
description: A JSDOM implementation of the WebDriver spec

scripts.build:dev:macos:
rm -f ./bin/jsdom-webdriver-macos && mkdir -p ./bin && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node
require(`../service.js`)' >> ./bin/jsdom-webdriver-macos && chmod +x ./bin/jsdom-webdriver-macos
scripts.build:dev:linux:
rm -f ./bin/jsdom-webdriver-linux && mkdir -p ./bin && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node
require(`../service.js`)' >> ./bin/jsdom-webdriver-linux && chmod +x ./bin/jsdom-webdriver-linux
scripts.test:watch:macos: npm run build:dev:macos && npm run test:watch
scripts.test:watch:linux: npm run build:dev:linux && npm run test:watch
